Plotting functions¶

@author: Eraldo Pomponi

@copyright: The MIIC Development Team (eraldo.pomponi@uni-leipzig.de)

Plot specific data structures¶

plot_dv Plot the “extended” dv dictionary
plot_single_corr_matrix Plot a single correlation matrix.
plot_trace_distance_section Plot a time distance section of an obspy stream or list of traces.
apparent_dv_plot Apparent velocity change plot
diff_apparent_dv_plot Differential apparent velocity change plot
